item.title: Javascript course

item.title: Papermod
item.description: hugo file system content folder Post, articles, pages all we work should be store in here. layout folder for theme override, if you want to modify themes layout just copy layout theme´s folder in here then modify. static for images and static files to add a new content: hugo new posts/newfile.md markdown sintax hugo server ![coverimage](/images/coverImage.png) to render an image the picture should be inside static folder this is an example to link an image to out article in papermod theme.
